Texts.Chs: 如果一个被猎杀的人真心希望成为猎人，他必须把这叁个物品放在一个祭坛上，并祈求毁灭他的敌人。放置的物品是：壹个远古神器，壹本远古之书和伍块刀剑碎片。一定要正确地念祷词，否则被摧毁的将会是你。
Texts.Eng: If the hunted truly wishes to becomes the hunter he must place these three objects upon an alter an offer a prayer for destruction of his enemies. An Elder Artifact, an Elder Tome and five Blade Shards. Be sure to utter the prayer correctly or it will be you who shall be destroyed.

Texts.Chs: 一把奇怪的弓的示意图。
